vdb.name: StockMat
vdb.description: Shows how to materialize into an Infinispan remote cache

model.name: StocksMatView
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Stock ( product_id integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"product_id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'integer', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), symbol string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"symbol"', NATIVE_TYPE 'string', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), price string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"price"', NATIVE_TYPE 'String', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', SIGNED 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), company_name string(256) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"company_name"', NATIVE_TYPE 'string', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT PK_prodid PRIMARY KEY(product_id) ) OPTIONS(MATERIALIZED 'TRUE', MATERIALIZED_TABLE 'StockJDGSource.Stock', "teiid_rel:ALLOW_MATVIEW_MANAGEMENT" 'TRUE', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_AFTER_LOAD_SCRIPT" 'execute StockJDGSource.native(''swap cache names'');', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_BEFORE_LOAD_SCRIPT" 'execute StockJDGSource.native(''truncate cache'');', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_STATUS_TABLE" 'Accounts.status', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_TTL" 5000, "teiid_rel:MATERIALIZED_STAGE_TABLE" 'StockJDGSource.ST_Stock', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_ONERROR_ACTION" 'THROW_EXCEPTION') AS SELECT Stocks.Stock.product_id, Stocks.Stock.symbol, CAST(Stocks.Stock.price AS String) AS price, Stocks.Stock.company_name FROM Stocks.Stock;
